titleStmt.title: The history of the life of the Duke of Espernon, the great favourite of France Englished by Charles Cotton, Esq. ; in three parts, containing twelve books ; wherein the history of France is continued from the year 1598 where D'Avila leaves off, down to our own times, 1642.
Histoire de la vie du duc d'Espernon. English
titleStmt.author: Girard, Guillaume, d. 1663.
Cotton, Charles, 1630-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes and A. Clark, for Henry Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Parts 2 and 3 have separate title pages.
Attributed to Guillaume Girard. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Libraries.
